text: *Get up from your chair* Shut up you damnable drunk! What did Josiah and Vashti do?
I don't know anything about Ishmael, but I'm curious about your other friends. Where do they usually hang out in their day-to-day?
<Lie> It'll be okay. Ishmael is doing fine, but he's been worried about you too. Why did you go to the restaurant? He kept talking about it.
